column3: Alright!!! More more more more more!!!!

I wish I had epic rides like that, my friends won't even show up to the groud ride hahahaha awesome vid rapha!
A crew that hip would have to be riding gravel.  Any other discipline would be dreadfully uncool.
Wait, was that David Tennant on the ferry tannoy @ 0:42 ? Perhaps some voice work in return for a free journey :-D ?

quirks laugh!!!
fuck cars
Well that was a Quirky bunch!
Ironic how the car they choose is often one of the worst driven!
More two, less four.
What bikes are they riding? I cans see a Canyon Grail..

You know I have always appreciated pretty much everything Rapha has done for both clothing (form and function) and cycling but the “four wheeled” car soft porn, well sorry, really bad taste. It’s something that we know we have to deal with, the drive to the ride dilemma, but please Rapha you could have made that less a part of this otherwise really good video.
beautifully editing !!
Awesome and inspiring!
yay lets all hire cars!
I have been a rapha customer for many years, there clothing is worth every penny, and I appriciate how there films keep me inspired !From a self confesed tired old f*&k, I thank you Rapha !
spot on

I love the filmmaking style here, and I hate to say it but I love the clothing too (when I see 25 adverts on a single jersey I wanna barf! Haha) Rapha I can not afford your shizz but I do love it! Also I can not get enough of your films. More city films please! those are so good. Cheers, Steve aka The Talking Fly
